content: just finished a knit row in mc 3 for row 8 this time you will be decreasing evenly across the row to get from 140 stitches to 112 so the best way to do that is *p2 p2tog p2 p2tog p2* all the way across the row this puts two decreases in each oval of the pattern your ovals go from 7 stitches wide to 6 and your slipped stitches go from 3 stitches to 2 pattern is now a multiple of 8 4 now continue with slip_stitch pattern b row 1-16 until the cowl is as tall as you want you can finish either at row 8 or at row 16 sample was made with 5 full repeats of pattern b and a total of 15 sets of ovals 5 finish with 2 more row of garter stitch and bind off loosely 6 block fairly aggressively to open up all the ovals and relax the garter stitch
